key.name: window-width
key.description: Value of the width of the GCleaner window measured in pixels.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Value of the height of the GCleaner window measured in pixels.

key.name: opening-x
key.description: Save the X Position of the window to restore it later.

key.name: opening-y
key.description: Save the Y Position of the window to restore it later.

key.name: amsn-main
key.description: Turn on or off all aMSN options.

key.name: amsn-cache
key.description: Turn on or off if GCleaner analyzes the cache of aMSN.

key.name: amsn-chat-logs
key.description: Turn on or off if GCleaner analyzes the logs of aMSN.
